BOOK A CLASS

“It takes two to make a thing go right”

  • A class comprises of a Trainer and the Trainee
  • A pair programming model is used
  • Our Class consist of 1:1 Hands-On-Training Sessions
  • Fundamental concepts are explained then practiced
  • Each Class is a 4 hour sub-module

“two heads are better than one.”

  • Pair programming consist of two programmers working simultaneously and co-operating on the same task.
  • Increases speed for complex solution and reduces workforce redundancies.
  • keeps all developers on the same page.

“Just Do It”

  • Classes are delivered using Zoom Voice and share-screen features
  • Real Time Pair programming will be facilitated via the repl.it platform

Module

  • WEB-DEV-1 (20HRS ) { MON-FRI @ 4HRS/DAY } [ US $666.00 ]

sub-Modules

  • HTML5 (4HRS ) { MON } [ US $133.30 ]
  • CSS FLEX (4HRS ) { TUE } [ US $133.30 ]
  • Intro to JS (4HRS ) { WED } [ US $133.30 ]
  • AJAX API (4HRS ) { THUR } [ US $133.30 ]
  • Fetch API (4HRS ) { FRI } [ US $133.30 ]

  • First Hour:

    We will first go over some basic principles in regards to the subject we are covering. This is in preparation for the next exercise.

  • Next Two Hours:

    Then complete a practical project that utilizes the concepts of the subject matter

  • Last Hour:

    We then wind down with a Q&A or practice sub-session.

“The Journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step"

  • Each Class entails a sub-module that is completed within a 4 hour time frame
  • Each Module consist of 5 Sub-Module classes that runs MON-FRI
  • Only one sub-module is delivered per day
  • This ensures that the trainee is exposed to the logic flow and pace that is required to be productive.

“Money grows on the tree of persistence."

  • A 20hr Module runs mon-fri, 4hrs per day, the cost is $666.00 USD
  • A 4hr Sub-Module cost is $133.30 USD
  • For custom missions, the cost per hour is $33.30 USD

“Time is of the Essence"

  • Classes can be booked within a 24/7 timeframe once a slot is available

“Fair is Fair"

  • To request a refund, Trainees must vocalise their intent within the first hour of the class.
  • Approved refunds will be processed within 2-14 business days after the approval of the refund request.
  • No refunds will be issued for Trainees who do not attend the class without prior notice.
  • Trainees are allowed only to reschedule a class once with prior notice before their class starts.
  • No refunds will be issued before the start of a class.
  • Please review the full Refund Policy at https://codex33.com/refund-policy
